p:
Polymerase chain reaction (PCR) and sequencing were performed to determine the presence of the carbapenems-resistance genes bla CTX-M-1-like, bla CTX-M-2-like, bla CTX-M-8-like, bla CTX-M-14-like, bla GES-like, bla GIM-like, bla IMP-10, bla IMP-like, bla KPC-2 , bla NDM-like, bla OXA-23, bla OXA-48-like, bla SHV-like, bla SIM-like, bla SME-like, bla SPM-like, bla TEM-like, and bla VIM-like
2 , and the polymyxin B-resistant gene mcr-1
5 .
